channel.title: Source SDK In Xubuntu.
channel.description:
Good day. I have posted this in the ubuntu forums, but recieved no definitive answer to this question: I have managed to run the source sdk using WINE, but hammer, (and the other utilities) run only to a certain point. That point is the starting screen. When I load a map (hammer) or model (HLMV), the screen goes dark, and I can only see the tabs/buttons for a few seconds, if I put my mouse over them. The visible tabs/buttons dissapear when I press the 3d/2d rendering window. I'm using Ubuntu Jaunty Jackalope (9.04). My PC specs are: 2gb ram/3 ghz core 2 duo/512 mb nvidia geforce.
If I can get a definitive answer, I will compile a detailed guide on how to get The SDK running in Linux.
Marked One.
